name: io.github.DMontgomery40/deepseek
title: DeepSeek MCP Server
description: Official DeepSeek MCP server for chat, completion, model listing, and balance endpoints.

headers.name: Authorization
headers.description: Bearer token for hosted DeepSeek MCP access (format: Bearer <token>)

environmentVariables.name: DEEPSEEK_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: DeepSeek API key used for upstream DeepSeek requests
